chapter.title: AJF - Security Reference
chapter.para: The AJF Security library provide a link with the container security layer. It allow the user authentication and authorization management - authorizations are roles and web resources based.

example.title: Reference "ajf-security" in your Maven 2 project configuration file 'pom.xml'

section.title: Introduction
section.para: AJF Security allow to securize the access to your applications. Authentication and authorizations functionalities are delegated to the application server container. As the security is delegated to the container, the configuration depends of the target application server container.

section.title: Authentication
section.para: Authentication is based on the JAAS API (Java Authentication and Authorization Service). Authentication datas are provided by authentication form (j_username/j_password submitted to j_security_check)
